title: My game is having problems
body: I log on to my game today and it keeps appearing 11000 IP when I have more same goes with the re rolls I only have one when I haven't log on in days. And when I'm playing I click and my character delays to move and I checked my internet I don't have problems with it and neither the mouse please help and fix this problem thank you!

replies.body: I've got your account pulled up, and your transaction history is showing quite a lot of IP purchases recently, as well as logins as recent as yesterday. If this wasn't you who logged in or made those purchased, I'd **strongly** urge you to reach out to our account team through our [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) in order to protect your account!
